div.p: This project's SVN repository can be checked out through anonymous access with either of the following commands:

pre.code: svn checkout http://facets.rubyforge.org/svn/ svn checkout svn://rubyforge.org/var/svn/facets

div.p: The last step may require super-user permissions (eg. use sudo).
Only project developers can access the SVN tree via this method. SSH must be installed on your client machine. Substitute developername with the proper values. Enter your site password when prompted.
Facets source code is hosted by RubyForge. You SCM page may provide additional information. You can browse the source via the web thru their basic interface.
